<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=333) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 137 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below. Add the bat and bird forms in [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=4) to your [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) list. If you have [Insect Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=327), you also add the wasp form to your _wild shape_ list. If you have [Ferocious Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=330), you also add the pterosaur form to your _wild shape_ list. Whenever you use _wild shape_ to gain a form that grants you a specific [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics checks.

<title level="2">Soaring Shape leads to...</title>
[Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=340), [Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1718)
name: Soaring Shape
